claim: The most common grade span served in Adelanto is K-8, not K-6.
reasoning: The database shows that in Adelanto, K-6 is the most common grade span served with 5 schools, while K-8 has only 4 schools. The claim asserts K-8 is most common and K-6 is not, which is the opposite of what the data shows.

content.thinking: Let me explore the database schema and then query the data to verify this claim.

input.description: List all tables in the database

content.content:
CREATE TABLE schools
(
    CDSCode     TEXT not null
        primary key,
    NCESDist    TEXT  null,
    NCESSchool  TEXT  null,
    StatusType  TEXT  not null,
    County      TEXT not null,
    District    TEXT not null,
    School      TEXT null,
    Street      TEXT null,
    StreetAbr   TEXT null,
    City        TEXT null,
    Zip         TEXT null,
    State       TEXT  null,
    MailStreet  TEXT null,
    MailStrAbr  TEXT null,
    MailCity    TEXT null,
    MailZip     TEXT null,
    MailState   TEXT  null,
    Phone       TEXT null,
    Ext         TEXT  null,
    Website     TEXT null,
    OpenDate    DATE        null,
    ClosedDate  DATE        null,
    Charter     INTEGER    null,
    CharterNum  TEXT  null,
    FundingType TEXT null,
    DOC         TEXT  not null,
    DOCType     TEXT not null,
    SOC         TEXT  null,
    SOCType     TEXT null,
    EdOpsCode   TEXT  null,
    EdOpsName   TEXT null,
    EILCode     TEXT  null,
    EILName     TEXT null,
    GSoffered   TEXT null,
    GSserved    TEXT  null,
    Virtual     TEXT  null,
    Magnet      INTEGER   null,
    Latitude    REAL      null,
    Longitude   REAL      null,
    AdmFName1   TEXT null,
    AdmLName1   TEXT null,
    AdmEmail1   TEXT null,
    AdmFName2   TEXT null,
    AdmLName2   TEXT null,
    AdmEmail2   TEXT null,
    AdmFName3   TEXT  null,
    AdmLName3   TEXT null,
    AdmEmail3   TEXT null,
    LastUpdate  DATE        not null
);

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/california_schools.sqlite" "SELECT GSserved, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM schools WHERE City = 'Adelanto' GROUP BY GSserved ORDER BY cnt DESC;"
input.description: Count grade spans served in Adelanto

content.text:
The data shows that in Adelanto, the most common grade span served is **K-6** with 5 schools, not K-8 which has 4 schools.

The claim states "The most common grade span served in Adelanto is K-8, not K-6." This is directly contradicted by the data — K-6 (5 schools) is actually more common than K-8 (4 schools).

```json

```
